directions: In a large saucepan, mix corn, cabbage, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, white sugar, ground dry mustard, celery seed, mustard seed, salt, turmeric, apple cider vinegar and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
Transfer the mixture to sterile containers. Seal and chill in the refrigerator until serving.
title: Corn Relish III
